de.tud.kom.p2psim.overlay.bt
Class BTConstants

java.lang.Object
  de.tud.kom.p2psim.overlay.bt.BTConstants

public class BTConstants
extends java.lang.Object

This class encapsulates all constants of this BitTorrent implementation. This makes it very easy to change the major parameters.

Author:
Jan Stolzenburg

Field Summary
static byte CHOKING_NUMBER_OF_OPTIMISTIC_UNCHOKES
          How many peers should be unchoked as optimistic unchokes?

          This value determines the number of bytes per block: 2 ^ itsBlockExponent = number of bytes per block.

          This value determines the number of bytes per piece. 2 ^ itsPieceExponent = number of bytes per piece.

Field Detail

TRACKER_REPLY_AMOUNT_OF_PEERS

public static final short TRACKER_REPLY_AMOUNT_OF_PEERS
The amount of peers, a tracker sends to a client.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

PEER_MAX_NEIGHBOURS

public static final short PEER_MAX_NEIGHBOURS
The maximum number of neighours that a peer accepts. The mainline client (version 3) refuses more than 55.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

PEER_MIN_NEIGHBOURS

public static final short PEER_MIN_NEIGHBOURS
If a client has less neighours, it actively tries to get more.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

public static final byte DOCUMENT_DEFAULT_BLOCK_EXPONENT
This value determines the number of bytes per block: 2 ^ itsBlockExponent = number of bytes per block.

DOCUMENT_DEFAULT_PIECE_EXPONENT

PEER_REPLY_TIMEOUT

public static final long PEER_REPLY_TIMEOUT
If a peer cannot reply to an request from another peer in this time, it will discard the request.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

PEER_CONNECT_RETRY

public static final long PEER_CONNECT_RETRY
How long should a peer wait between connection attempts? A very low value will result in a flood of requests!

See Also:
Constant Field Values

PEER_KEEP_ALIVE_OPERATION_PERIOD

public static final long PEER_KEEP_ALIVE_OPERATION_PERIOD
How often gets the keep alive operation called?

See Also:
Constant Field Values

PEER_CONNECTION_TIMEOUT

public static final long PEER_CONNECTION_TIMEOUT
If a peer doesn't receive a keep alive message for this time, it will close the connection.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

Constant Field Values

DOWNLOAD_QUEUE_REQUEST_SIZE

public static final byte DOWNLOAD_QUEUE_REQUEST_SIZE
How many requests should be send to a peer at the same time? TODO: The simulator cannot handle more than one. Otherwise, the bandwith will be exceeded massivly!

See Also:
Constant Field Values

DURATION_OF_UPLOAD_AFTER_DOWNLOAD_FINISHED

See Also:
Constant Field Values

MESSAGE_SERVICE_CATEGORY_TRACKER_TO_PEER

public static final TransProtocol MESSAGE_SERVICE_CATEGORY_TRACKER_TO_PEER
The message categories for the messages. BitTorrent uses TCP for the P2P data transfer and UDP for contacting the tracker.
